email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for a 100,000 MT cargo. The laycan is October 15-20, and the starting freight rate is in the low 50s ($50.50 per MT). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we expected. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the vessel’s DWT and LOA? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. The MV Ocean Star has a DWT of 120,000 and an LOA of 250 meters. Given the current market, the best I can do is $49.75 per MT. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. $49.75 is closer to our target. However, we’d like to lock in at $49.50 per MT. Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? We’d like to finalize this by tomorrow. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can agree to $49.50 per MT. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. If this works for you, I’ll draft the charter party agreement. Let me know. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $49.50 per MT and $20,000 demurrage rate work for us. Please proceed with the charter party agreement. Thanks for your help on this. Cheers, John
